overview:
Michael Turner is a digital strategist and entrepreneur who specializes in building and leading teams that turn ideas into user friendly applications and successful start-up businesses.

An an early adopter of the Internet as a business platform in 1995, his career includes producing digital strategies for Top 200 companies and state-owned enterprises.

He has a proven track record negotiating creative partnerships with global brands, large scale enterprises and government.

Turner is currently obsessed with Eventfinda, an event marketing, syndication and ticketing platform he founded in 2005.

Previously, Turner founded RockSolid in 2001, a strategy consulting and development services business with a portfolio of billion-dollar companies. He exited the business in 2004.

He also has a unhealthy obsession with UX design, and lives by the philosophy that if something is made easy to use, more people are likely to use it.

He can be found on Twitter @michaelturnernz.

degrees.subject: International Trade & Finance, Cross Cultural Negotiation

external_links.title: The Myth of the Balanced Life
